item.title: Design & Document your APIs with Swagger
item.description: What is Swagger? Swagger is a very popular framework for describing RESTful APIs using a common language that everyone can understand. It is actually a set of open-source tools for designing, building, documenting and consuming REST APIs. Swagger Specification? The Swagger Specification (currently known as the OpenAPI specification) is a powerful definition format to describe RESTful APIs. The specification creates a RESTful interface for easily developing and consuming an API by effectively mapping all the resources and operations associated with it.
